class error_category;
}}

{{tt|std::error_category}} serves as the base class for specific error category types, such as {{lc|std::system_category}}, {{lc|std::iostream_category}}, etc. Each specific category class defines the {{tt|error_code}} - {{tt|error_condition}} mapping and holds the explanatory strings for all error_conditions. The objects of error category classes are treated as singletons, passed by reference.
